description: Everybody's favourite comfort food has had a fresh update. The kids will love this version of mac 'n' cheese - even if it is green.
name: Kid's Green Mac 'n' Cheese Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, preheat flasks, if using, by filling with boiling water and standing for 5 minutes. Drain. Spoon pasta into flasks. Sprinkle with parsley. Serve.
